title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed 
Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2021. 
(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 13th day of February

in Schedule 1 by the substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph 10: 

“

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for a technical amendment to the Health Act 1947 
(Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) 
(Covid-19) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 536 of 2020).
